title: Jumbo Sized Beach/Picnic/Festival Pocket Blanket $6.49 After Code (Reg. $25) + Free Shipping
text: Jumbo Sized Beach/Picnic/Festival Pocket Blanket $6.49 After Code (Reg. $25) + Free Shipping Hop over to That Daily Deal and get a deal on Jumbo Sized Beach/Picnic/Festival Pocket Blanket. Big (78″x82″) yet compresses into a pocket sized carry pouch! So much better than a beach towel! It’s great for beaches, but also for picnics, parks, family trips, sports events, open-air festivals, camping, hiking, fishing, other outdoor activities! Save additional 35% with code JUMBO35 at checkout. Jumbo Sized Beach/Picnic/Festival Pocket Blanket $6.49 After Code (Reg. $25) + Free Shipping - Excellent Quality: Beach blanket made from quick drying, breathable rip-stop 210T polyester, and it can effectively prevent sand, water, and rips. Just shake the blanket and it easily gets rid of all the sand once. - Easy to Carry: Big sized picnic beach blanket will comfortably fit 3-7 adults . Our beach mat can be easily folded down into the attached carried bag. This process is simple and convenient, so that you can carry it anywhere. - Multiple Capabilities: Beach Blanket come with packable bag, 4 *Anchor Stakes, 4 Corner Pockets and carabiners, so all the problems you worry about, we have solved them for you, and can enjoy a good vacation at the beach. - Versatile Style: beach blanket is not only suitable for beaches, picnics, parks, family trips, sports events, open-air festivals, camping, hiking, fishing, other occasions and outdoor activities or simply as an emergency pad & gear to have around.
